      • translate

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage translate(double translateX,
                                              double translateY,
                                              java.awt.Color backgrounColor)
        Translates image in x and y direction by translateX and translateY pixels.
        Parameters:
        translateX - - number of pixels to move on x axis.
        translateY - - number of pixels to move on y axis.
        backgrounColor - - background color of new image
        Returns:
        new translated BufferedImage object.

      • rotate

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage rotate(double angle,
                                           java.awt.Color backgrounColor)
        Rotates given image by specified angle. Precondition: square image.
        Parameters:
        angle - - angle for rotation in degrees.
        backgrounColor - - background color of new image
        Returns:
        new BufferedImage object which represents original image rotated by 'angle' degrees.

      • scale

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage scale(double scaleX,
                                          double scaleY)
        Scales image and return in x and y direction by factors scaleX and scaleY.
        Parameters:
        scaleX - - scaling factor for x axis.
        scaleY - - scaling factor for y axis.
        Returns:

      • imageToBufferedImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageToBufferedImage(java.awt.Image img)
        Helper method for converting Image into BufferedImage.
        Parameters:
        img - - Image object.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage object representing img parameter.

      • splitImage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage[] splitImage(int vertical,
                                                 int horizontal)
        Split image into parts and returns it like array.
        Parameters:
        vertical - - number of chunks vertically.
        horisontal - - number of chunks horizontally.
        Returns:
        array containing (vertical*horizontal) chunks of original image.
